methods.name: getBackCamera
methods.short: Get device id of back facing camera. Returns -1 if no match is found

methods.name: getCameraOrientation
methods.short: Get the physical orientation of the camera. Typically on a phone the camera mounted in landscape mode, this returns 90

methods.name: getFacingOfCamera
methods.short:
Get facing of camera. Leave device = -1 to get selected cameras facing

Returns 0 on backfacing camera, and 1 on frontal facing camera.

methods.name: getFrontCamera
methods.short: Get device id of front facing (selfie) camera. Returns -1 if no match is found

methods.name: setDesiredFrameRate
methods.short: Set desired frame rate of the camera. By default will the camera pick the highest frame rate available

methods.name: setDeviceID
methods.short: Set specific camera device id. Must be a value between 0 and numCameras. Default is first back facing camera

methods.name: setup
methods.parameters: int w, int h
